description.value:
You can hide a small object of up to light Bulk inside a hollow cavity on one of your forearms. It takes three @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Interact]{Interact} actions to store an object in this way.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DCs of checks for others to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Seek]{Seek} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Steal]{Steal} objects stored inside your arm.

If you store a weapon in your arm, you can use a single action to Interact to draw the weapon into the hand corresponding to your internal cavity, then Strike with the weapon.
